messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1126
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/16/01 10:16:11 PM Mountain Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/16/01 10:16:11 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< That's in Idaho? I'm way over in Michigan, but it
sounds fascinating.Do you have more info you could
somehow send me? I'm just intrigued! I always loved
the idea of an intentional community.Juli

No actually, we are moving this year and we will be setting up our community
in Western Washington, around the Seattle to Tacoma area. I would love to
talk to you about it more. Shall I sen you some information off list?

Nanci K.
>>

Nanci,

Are you in Idaho now? I am in Sun Valley. Just curious.

NICKI~
